name: We're in RUSH
description:
The game is created for Mini-Jam 88

I am a complete beginner. So I apologize if you face any issues. Also please provide feedback on the game. It will help me to improve my games.

We're in RUSH is a game in which a family have to go to the safest building of the city to survive the great earthquake. Don't collide with the other buildings because it can damage and destroy the car. So rush to the big black building fast.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys for movements.

Credits:

Car model: www.turbosquid.com

Building model: www.free3d.com

SFX: www.freesoundeffects.com

Unity Asset Store

UI image source: www.pngegg.com
